Welcome

I'm propagandist for pickled red onions, a rare meat activist, barely-monetizable YouTuber and Captain of the sailing vessel Argo. I've been creating content online for well over a decade now, but delivering to a very small audience. Undoubtedly, you've discovered this website by mistake, but thanks for stopping by anyway-and, feel free to browse around.
